definitions.definition: A person , thing or name typifying a certain quality or idea ; an embodiment or exemplification .
examples: Adolf Hitler was the personification of anti-Semitism.

definitions.definition: A literary device in which an inanimate object or an idea is given human qualities .
examples: The writer used personification to convey her ideas.

definitions.definition: An artistic representation of an abstract quality as a human
examples: The Grim Reaper is a personification of death.

main_definition: A person , thing or name typifying a certain quality or idea ; an embodiment or exemplification .
secondary_definitions: A literary device in which an inanimate object or an idea is given human qualities .
An artistic representation of an abstract quality as a human
